title: dhanyanAde nA
sahitya:
dhanyanAde nA nI jagadoLu dhanyanAde nA


anupallavi

  pannaga shayanana kaNNindali kaNDu dhanyanAde nA


caraNam 1    unnata mahima pAvanna carita sura sannuta caraNana pannagAri 
vahanna puruSaranna cenniga shrIrangana mahimeya kaNDu
    caraNam 2    dEva dEvOttama kAva namma Iga bhAva janayyanu 
kAvERi tIrada uttama kSEtradoLu pAvana narasingana kaNDu
    caraNam 3    bhAnu kOTiprabha svAnanda pUrNana dIna rakSakana siri
purandara viTTala cenniga shrI rangana mahimeya kaNDu
